description: One-Hour Texas Chili can be used for Frito pie You top either a small open bag of Fritos, or a pile of Fritos on a plate, with this beef chili, grated Cheddar cheese and chopped onions When served on a plate, some people call it a Straw Hat.
title: One-Hour Texas Chili
title_page: One-Hour Texas Chili Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
One-Hour Texas Chili can be used for Frito pie. You top either a small open bag of Fritos, or a pile of Fritos on a plate, with this beef chili, grated Cheddar cheese and chopped onions. When served on a plate, some people call it a Straw Hat.
Featured in: A Great Big Texas Helping Of Home.
Learn: How to Make Chili
